"use strict";
/**
 * @ignore
 * BEGIN HEADER
 *
 * Contains:        Custom Tags
 * CVM-Role:        Utility Function
 * Maintainer:      Hendrik Erz
 * License:         GNU GPL v3
 *
 * Description:     This module defines custom tags that our custom parsers add
 *                  to the Lezer Trees emitted by the Markdown mode. These tags
 *                  are provided both to the Markdown parser as well as the
 *                  highlighter mode so they know about them.
 *
 * END HEADER
 */
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
exports.customTags = void 0;
const highlight_1 = require("@lezer/highlight");
// NOTE: Changes here must be reflected in theme/syntax.ts and parser/markdown-parser.ts
exports.customTags = {
    YAMLFrontmatter: highlight_1.Tag.define(highlight_1.tags.monospace),
    YAMLFrontmatterStart: highlight_1.Tag.define(highlight_1.tags.contentSeparator),
    YAMLFrontmatterEnd: highlight_1.Tag.define(highlight_1.tags.contentSeparator),
    // Meta-tags only used to contain the actual values
    YAMLFrontmatterPair: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    YAMLFrontmatterSeq: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    YAMLFrontmatterMap: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    Citation: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    Footnote: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    FootnoteRef: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    FootnoteRefLabel: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    FootnoteRefBody: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    // Zettelkasten links
    ZknLink: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    ZknLinkContent: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    ZknLinkTitle: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    ZknLinkPipe: highlight_1.Tag.define(highlight_1.tags.processingInstruction),
    // Zettelkasten tags
    ZknTag: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    ZknTagContent: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    // Pandoc attributes, like: `# Heading or Title {.unnumbered}`
    PandocAttribute: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    HighlightMark: highlight_1.Tag.define(),
    HighlightContent: highlight_1.Tag.define()
};
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,

"use strict";
/**
 * @ignore
 * BEGIN HEADER
 *
 * Contains:        genericTextNode
 * CVM-Role:        Utility
 * Maintainer:      Hendrik Erz
 * License:         GNU GPL v3
 *
 * Description:     A simple function that wraps a piece of plain text into an
 *                  ASTNode.
 *
 * END HEADER
 */
Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
exports.genericTextNode = genericTextNode;
/**
 * Creates a generic text node; this is used to represent textual contents of
 * SyntaxNodes.
 *
 * @param   {number}    from              The absolute start offset
 * @param   {number}    to                The absolute end offset
 * @param   {string}    value             The actual text
 * @param   {string}    whitespaceBefore  Potential whitespace before the node
 *
 * @return  {TextNode}                    The rendered TextNode
 */
function genericTextNode(from, to, value, whitespaceBefore = '') {
    return { type: 'Text', name: 'text', from, to, value, whitespaceBefore };
}
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,
